caption: A man and a woman are sitting in a room chatting. After a scene transition, a man in a coat sits in a cold-toned room. Two men in suits enter the room, and one of them opens the door. The man in the coat puts on his hat and leaves. The scene shifts again to two people conversing in a European-style room. Later, many gentlemen gather in a room, and one of them sits at a table signing documents. He quickly moves to another room, sits in a chair, and reads from a script into a microphone. Then, a splendidly dressed man appears, signifying his high status. He enters a room with a group of gentlemen who look toward him. Afterward, he appears in a hallway, wearing his magnificent attire, and walks toward his daughters and wife.
